scripts.build: npm run changelog && npm run css && npm run html && npm run mandoc
scripts.html: for file in *-body.html; do node build.mjs "$file" > ${file%-body.html}.html ; done
scripts.changelog:
echo '
' > changelog-body.html && git log master --oneline | awk '{a=$1;$1="";print ""a""$0}' >> changelog-body.html && echo '
' >> changelog-body.html
scripts.mandoc: git show master:man/getargv.1 | mandoc -T html -O style=mandoc.css > man.html && /usr/bin/curl -sSL https://mandoc.bsd.lv/snapshots/mandoc.tar.gz | /usr/bin/tar -x --strip-components=1 --include='*mandoc.css' --file -
scripts.clean: rm mandoc.css man.html changelog.html fast.html hallofshame.html index.html interface.html resilient.html
